name: iinexd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))), wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))), wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2))), wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: The existence of an indexed union. ` x ` is normally a free-variable parameter in ` B ` , which should be read ` B ( x ) ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
